title: How to plan a memorable budget holiday in the Faroe Islands - Quora

response.answer_text: I traveled to the Faroe Islands with my Mom this past spring and we were able to book a reasonably priced trip. Make sure you book your flights and rental car in advance. We ended up losing out a on a really great flight deal because we waited too long. Also consider Airbnb or hostels instead of hotels. Check out the link below for my favorite places we visited in the Faroes. Tórshavn

If you go there and leave your hotel, you are guaranteed a memorable experience! The Faroes are one of the world’s most fascinating places, in my opinion. Without more information about when you are going and your interests, however, it’s hard to say much more.
